name: eso_armory_file_uploader
description: Create your own character armory and let others see your fame!

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . eso-afu --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=release-builds --icon=images/icon256x256.ico --prune=true--win32metadata.FileDescription="Lightweight online armory for Elder Scrolls Online characters" --win32metadata.CompanyName="ESO Armory" --win32metadata.ProductName="ESO Armory File uploader" --app-copyright="2019 (c) ESO Armory"

author: ESO Armory
